_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Website
author: contact@evo-cloud.be

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash

cd /mnt/server

rm -r /mnt/server/.git
rm -r /mnt/server/System
rm -r /mnt/server/Root
rm Dockerfile

echo "⟳ Installing Dependencies ..."
apk --update add git zip curl

echo "⟳ Cloning Files ..."
git clone https://github.com/EvoCloudBE/Website-Egg ./

echo "⟳ Setting Up Permissions ..."
rm -f Website-Egg.json
chmod +x /mnt/server/System/Start.sh

cd /mnt/server/Root
if [ "${AZURIOM}" == "false" ] || [ "${AZURIOM}" == "0" ]; then
    if [ "${MINEWEB}" == "false" ] || [ "${MINEWEB}" == "0" ]; then
        if [ "${WORDPRESS}" == "false" ] || [ "${WORDPRESS}" == "0" ]; then
            echo "✓ Install Complete !"
            echo "✓ Go to 5.135.82.162:(PORT) !"
        else
            echo "⟳ Removing Default Index ..."
            rm index.php
            
            echo "⟳ Downloading Wordpress ..."
            wget https://wordpress.org/latest.zip
                    
            echo "⟳ Extracting Wordpress ..."
            unzip latest.zip
            mv wordpress/* ./
                    
            echo "⟳ Removing Residual Files ..."
            rm -r wordpress/
            rm latest.zip
                
            echo "✓ Install Complete !"
            echo "✓ Go to 5.135.82.162:(PORT) !"
        fi
    else
        echo "⟳ Removing Default Index ..."
        rm index.php
            
        echo "⟳ Downloading MineWeb ..."
        wget https://github.com/MineWeb/MineWebCMS/archive/master.zip
                    
        echo "⟳ Extracting MineWeb ..."
        unzip master.zip
        mv MineWebCMS-master/* ./
                    
        echo "⟳ Removing Residual Files ..."
        rm -r MineWebCMS-master/
        rm master.zip
                    
        echo "✓ Install Complete !"
        echo "✓ Go to 5.135.82.162:(PORT) !"
    fi
else
    echo "⟳ Removing Default Index ..."
    rm index.php
            
    echo "⟳ Downloading Azuriom ..."
    wget https://github.com/Azuriom/AzuriomInstaller/releases/latest/download/AzuriomInstaller.zip
                    
    echo "⟳ Extracting Azuriom ..."
    unzip AzuriomInstaller.zip

    echo "⟳ Removing Residual Files ..."
    rm AzuriomInstaller.zip
    
    echo "⟳ Setting Up Permission ..."
    chmod -R 755 /mnt/server/Root
    chown -R www-data:www-data /mnt/server/Root
    
    echo "⟳ Setting Up Nginx ..."
    sed -i 's/root \/home\/container\/Root;/root \/home\/container\/Root\/public;/' /mnt/server/System/Config/Nginx/conf.d/default.conf

    echo "✓ Install Complete !"
    echo "✓ Go to 5.135.82.162:(PORT) !"
fi
